fields.name: home_categories
fields.label: Select Home Categories
fields.description: Categories in the home screen as tabs. Select none to hide the home categories as tabs

fields.name: post_details_layout
fields.label: Select Post Details Layout
fields.description: Choose you favourite post details layout or keep it random by not selecting any option.
fields.pick_custom:
layout1|Post Details Layout 1
layout2|Post Details Layout 2
layout3|Post Details Layout 3

fields.name: blocked_categories
fields.label: Blocked Categories
fields.description: Block any categories and it's posts in the app

fields.name: social_logins_enabled
fields.label: Social Logins Enabled
fields.description: Google, Facebook & Apple Login(Only for iOS) - Configurations required in the app

fields.name: post_interval_count
fields.label: Post Interval Count for Ads
fields.description: Default value is 5. That means a custom ad or native ad will be shown in between posts list after every 5 posts.

fields.name: banner_ads_enabled
fields.label: Banner Ads Enabled
fields.description: Banner ads at the bottom of the post details screen

fields.name: interstitial_ads_enabled
fields.label: Interstitial Ads Enabled
fields.description: Interstitial ad is a full screen popup ad. When the amount of clicks are meets your provided click amount criterial, An Interstitial ad will be shown when users clicks on any posts.

fields.name: click_amount
fields.label: Click Amount to Show An Interstitial Ad
fields.description: Set the user click amount to show Interstotial ads. (If the value is 4 that means if the user clicks on any 4 articles, then an full screen ads will be shown. And the next ad will be shown after 8 clicks and so on..)

fields.name: native_ad_placements
fields.label: Native Ad Placements
fields.description: Where do you want to place your native ads?
fields.pick_custom:
home_top|Top of the latest posts in home screen
inside_list|In between posts list
post_details_top|Top of the post details
post_details_bottom|Bottom of the post details|bottom

fields.name: custom_ads_enabled
fields.label: Custom Ads Enabled
fields.description: If Native Ad is enabled, Custom Ads will be ignored.

fields.name: custom_ad_asset
fields.label: Custom Ad Asset
fields.description: Any Image you want to show as ad. (300x500 pixels recommended image size)

fields.name: custom_ad_destination_url
fields.label: Custom Ad Destination URL
fields.description: The website you want to navigate users after clicking the ads.

fields.name: custom_ad_placements
fields.label: Custom Ad Placements
fields.description: Where do you want to place your custom ads?
fields.pick_custom:
home_top|Top of the latest posts in home screen
inside_list|In between posts list
post_details_top|Top of the post details
post_details_bottom|Bottom of the post details|bottom

fields.name: welcome_screen_enabled
fields.label: Welcome Screen Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable welcome screen

fields.name: onboarding_enabled
fields.label: On-Boarding Enabled
fields.description: The introduction screens. (Disabled by default)

fields.name: login_enabled
fields.label: User Login Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable User Login - If you select No then 'Welcome Screen' & 'User Comments' will be disabled automatically.

fields.name: fb_login_enabled
fields.label: Facebook Login Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable Facebook login. Social logins must be enabled first to use that.

fields.name: comments_enabled
fields.label: User Comments Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable user comments on post in the app

fields.name: video_tab_enbaled
fields.label: Video Tab Enbaled
fields.description: Video tab to show video posts separately

fields.name: menubar_enabled
fields.label: MenuBar Enabled
fields.description: Disable top menu navigation bar (Drawer)

fields.name: logo_position_center
fields.label: Logo Position at Center
fields.description: Set logo position in the app bar at center or left(Default)

fields.name: featured_post_enabled
fields.label: Featured Posts Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable featured posts

fields.name: feature_posts_autoslide
fields.label: Feature Posts Autoslide
fields.description: Automatic slides of feature posts after a certain period of time

fields.name: popular_post_enabled
fields.label: Popular Posts Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable popular posts

fields.name: multilanguage_enabled
fields.label: Multi-Language Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable Multi-Language (Language popup won't be visible and App will use English as default language)

fields.name: social_embedded_enabled
fields.label: Social Media Embedded Posts Enabled
fields.description: Social media embedded post from twitter, facebook, etc

fields.name: post_views_enabled
fields.label: Post Views Count Enabled
fields.description: Enable/Disable post views count in the article details screen. 'Popular Posts' plugin is required for this feature.

fields.name: datetime_enabled
fields.label: Show DateTime
fields.description: Show datetime of the posts

fields.name: purchase_code
fields.label: Envato Purchase Code
fields.description: Enter your envato purchase code. How to get the purchase code? Check here: https://help.market.envato.com/hc/en-us/articles/202822600-Where-Is-My-Purchase-Code-

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured Post?
fields.description: Assign this post as a featured post in the app

fields.name: video_post
fields.label: Video Post?
fields.description: Assign this post as a video post in the app. You should add a video/url in the below fields.

fields.name: video_url
fields.label: Add Video
fields.description: Add video for video post.

fields.name: youtube_url
fields.label: Youtube Video Url
fields.description: Add youtube video url for video post. If you add both video and youtube video url, youtube video will be ignored.

fields.name: vimeo_url
fields.label: Vimeo Video Url
fields.description: Add vimeo video url for video post. If you add video or youtube video url, vimeo video will be ignored.

fields.name: start_date
fields.label: Start Date
fields.description: Event start date

fields.name: end_date
fields.label: End Date
fields.description: Event end date

fields.name: location
fields.label: Location
fields.description: Event location

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Event description
